Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Hey! Watanabe-San is back!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I'm back, too! And the food!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Cheers erupt among the Forsaken as they help Zong unload the food and settle into the wrapping process.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Looks interesting, Commandant. Could Liv and I try our hand at wrapping one?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Halfway there, Lucia turns back, hesitant.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant... if I manage to make a Zong, would you try one?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Let me think about it', 3: '105', 4: "Can't wait", 5: '106'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I see... I'm not that good at cooking, anyway...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just joking', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Really? Okay, I'll give it a try.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'We used to wrap Zongs together on the Nighter, from time to time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Not many good memories on that ship, but a few do come by every once in a while.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'True. No matter how dark our world gets, there are always a few things that shine bright.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu bites into a steamed Zong, and his face turns.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Hey, you! Forsaken! Care to explain why this Zong is sweet?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What are you on about? Zongs are made to be sweet.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Zongs are supposed to be savory, with meat in the filling! This is a dessert!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: 'Hey, kid! You got a problem with our Zongs, you come talk to Zong!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spirited disagreement on the nature of Zongs notwithstanding, the bond between Changyu and the Forsaken seems to be stronger than ever.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'You tell them, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've finishing wrapping ours too, Commandant. Please have a taste.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zongs really are better sweet', 3: '200', 4: 'Zongs are better off savory', 5: '200'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory126.png'}
{3: 'â€” A few days later, on board the Eternal Engine, Changyu debriefs Jamilah on recent events.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Sure wasn't easy, but at least we closed the Forsaken deal.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'So these are the fabled Zongs of the Forsaken? Not bad. Easy to manufacture, and at a reasonable cost.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Slightly sweet. Not bad.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Maybe we can host a festival like Duanwu on the train... or better yet, promote it everywhere along our route.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Such a festival would involve every rung of society, encourage spending... there's money to be made here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's a swell idea, Boss, but I do disagree on one point.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Oh? Enlighten me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Zongs are supposed to be savory, not sweet!', 4: '1'}
